entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022
